target.name: run
target.echo: to known full location of build file${ant.file}
to know the default project name of ant ${ant.project.default-target}
to know the invoked target of ant ${ant.project.invoked-targets}
to know the core libraries of ant ${ant.core.lib}
to know the home of ant ${ant.home}
to know the library of ant ${ant.library.dir}
